changed_files.diff:
diff --git a/scapy/layers/smb2.py b/scapy/layers/smb2.py
index d76f982..3595cd4 100644
--- a/scapy/layers/smb2.py
+++ b/scapy/layers/smb2.py
@@ -1506,7 +1506,11 @@ class WINNT_ACL(Packet):
         ByteField("AclRevision", 2),
         ByteField("Sbz1", 0x00),
         FieldLenField(
-            "AclSize", None, length_of="Aces", adjust=lambda _, x: x + 14, fmt="<H"
+            "AclSize",
+            None,
+            length_of="Aces",
+            adjust=lambda _, x: x + 8,
+            fmt="<H",  # total size including header : AclRevision(1) + Sbz1(1) + AclSize(2) + AceCount(2) + Sbz2(2)
         ),
         FieldLenField("AceCount", None, count_of="Aces", fmt="<H"),
         ShortField("Sbz2", 0),
